title: Conjure Elemental
content:
l, water elemental, stone elemental, air elemental;Lvl6(upcast): fire myrmidon, water myrmidon, stone myrmidon, air myrmidon

Elemental Variants

The air elemental can use Primordial Gales, Gushing Air, and can Shock your foes.

The earth elemental can use Seismic Strike, Soil-Clogged Slam, and can create sludgy mud surfaces while walloping your foes.

The fire elemental can use Smouldering Touch and Erupting Cinder.

The water elemental can use Winter's Breath and Slam.

The myrmidon can cast I
